item.description:
Greater Kennedy Plaza is kicking off its summer season with a party.

Come enjoy some free music and an opportunity to sit outside in a park and enjoy some Trinity Brewhouse Beer!

From their site:

    Please join us as we kick off another season of exciting events here in Greater Kennedy Plaza! We’ve got a great line-up of daily programming — and to celebrate, we’re throwing a party!

    * Thursday, June 4, 2009
    * 5:00pm - 7:00pm
    * Burnside Park in Greater Kennedy Plaza

    Relax after work with some great tunes, delicious food, and a sampler of our fun weekly events! Latin jazz band Alebreke will be performing lively tunes - with a beer garden hosted by Trinity Brewhouse!

    We’ll also have kids games, skateboarding for $3 in the Bank of America Skating Center and some great prizes in our free raffle!

    Special thanks to all our season sponsors:
    The City of Providence: Dept. of Art, Culture + Tourism, Parks Department, and Recreation Department, Boston Sports Clubs, Coalition for Community Development, Downtown Improvement District, Farm Fresh RI, Fountain of Youth, General Packet, Providence Foundation, RIPTA, Trinity Brewhouse.

    See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be by the bike racks above the skating center across from RI Foundation
item.name: Greater Kennedy Plaza Summer Kickoff
